  • Method Details

    • Login

      public int Login(String cred, String pass)
      Login method allow you to make the LogIN of an existing user
      Parameters:
      cred - are the credential of the user
      pass - is the current password of the user
      Returns:
      if authentication was successful, it returns the user's id, otherwise it returns -1

    • Registrazione

      public void Registrazione(String n, String c, String cdf, String usnm, String ind, String em, String pw)
      Registrazione method make the registration of a new user
      Parameters:
      ind - the current user address
      cdf - the current user TaxFiscalCode
      em - the current user email
      pw - the current user password
      usnm - the current user username
      n - the current user name
      c - the current user surname

    • CheckDuplicatedUsers

      public boolean CheckDuplicatedUsers(String email, String userid, String UserRepository)
      CheckDuplicatedUser method check if there are similar user
      Parameters:
      UserRepository - check the userRepository
      userid - check the current userID
      email - check the current user email
      Returns:
      boolean value represents the result of the email uniqueness check
